quotes.message: You can't depend on your eyes when your imagination is out of focus.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: Imagination will often carry us to worlds that never were. But without it we go nowhere.
quotes.name: Carl Sagan

quotes.message: Everything you can imagine is real.
quotes.name: Pablo Picasso

quotes.message: I imagine that yes is the only living thing.
quotes.name: E. E. Cummings

quotes.message: To treat your facts with imagination is one thing, to imagine your facts is another.
quotes.name: John Burroughs

quotes.message: Imagination grows by exercise, and contrary to common belief, is more powerful in the mature than in the young.
quotes.name: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.message: I imagine, therefore I belong and am free.
quotes.name: Lawrence Durrell

quotes.message: Logic will get you from A to Z; imagination will get you everywhere.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Imagination does not become great until human beings, given the courage and the strength, use it to create.
quotes.name: Maria Montessori

quotes.message: Imagination is the golden-eyed monster that never sleeps. It must be fed; it cannot be ignored.
quotes.name: Patricia A. Mckillip

quotes.message: Imagination is everything. It is the preview of life's coming attractions.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Reason is intelligence taking exercise. Imagination is intelligence with an erection.
quotes.name: Victor Hugo

quotes.message: Because when you are imagining, you might as well imagine something worth while.
quotes.name: L.M. Montgomery

quotes.message: Imagination means nothing without doing.
quotes.name: Charles Chaplin

quotes.message: The imagination is a palette of bright colors. You can use it to touch up memories ? or you can use it to paint dreams.
quotes.name: Robert Brault

quotes.message: Nothing encourages creativity like the chance to fall flat on one's face.
quotes.name: James D. Finley

quotes.message: The creative person is both more primitive and more cultivated, more destructive, a lot madder and a lot saner, than the average person.
quotes.name: Frank Barron

quotes.message: Sometimes imagination pounces; mostly it sleeps soundly in the corner, purring.
quotes.name: Terri Guillemets

quotes.message: He who has imagination without learning has wings but no feet.
quotes.name: Joseph Joubert

quotes.message: Imagination is the highest kite one can fly.
quotes.name: Lauren Bacall

quotes.message: Perhaps imagination is only intelligence having fun.
quotes.name: George Scialabba

quotes.message: I believe in the imagination. What I cannot see is infinitely more important than what I can see.
quotes.name: Duane Michals

quotes.message: Those who do not think outside the box are easily contained.
quotes.name: Nicolas Manetta

quotes.message: Creative minds have always been known to survive any kind of bad training.
quotes.name: Anna Freud

quotes.message: To think creatively, we must be able to look afresh at what we normally take for granted.
quotes.name: George Kneller

quotes.message: Imagination governs the world.
quotes.name: Napolon Bonaparte

quotes.message: Imagination was given to man to compensate him for what he is not; a sense of humor to console him for what he is.
quotes.name: Sir Francis Bacon

quotes.message: The imagination is man's power over nature.
quotes.name: Wallace Stevens

quotes.message: My imagination makes me human and makes me a fool; it gives me all the world and exiles me from it.
quotes.name: Ursula K. Le Guin

quotes.message: The imagination, give it the least license, dives deeper and soars higher than Nature goes.
quotes.name: Henery David Thoreau

quotes.message: Imagination is an inner resource. That's why it takes stopping, slowing, silencing, reassuring, embracing to allow it to speak.
quotes.name: Suzanne Beth Stinnett

quotes.message: Imagination is actually a form of computation. Imagination gives calculated and instinctive solutions for the future.
quotes.name: L. Ron Hubbard

quotes.message: It is better to have enough ideas for some of them to be wrong, than to be always right by having no ideas at all.
quotes.name: Edward de Bono

quotes.message: Imagination is the voice of daring. If there is anything godlike about God, it is that.
quotes.name: Henry Miller

quotes.message: Fantasy was always only a reality waiting to be switched on.
quotes.name: Joe Hill

quotes.message: The true sign of intelligence is not knowledge but imagination.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: The power of imagination makes us infinite.
quotes.name: John Muir

quotes.message: All the works of man have their origin in creative fantasy. What right have we then to depreciate imagination.
quotes.name: Carl Gustav Jung

quotes.message: Imagination disposes of everything; it creates beauty, justice, and happiness, which is everything in this world.
quotes.name: Blaise Pascal

quotes.message: The quality of the imagination is to flow and not to freeze.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Imagination is not a talent of some people but is the health of everyone.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Imagination is a poor matter when it has to part company with understanding.
quotes.name: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.message: Only in men's imagination does every truth find an effective and undeniable existence. Imagination, not invention, is the supreme master of art as of life.
quotes.name: Joseph Conrad

quotes.message: Imagination is always the fabric of social life and the dynamic of history. The influence of real needs and compulsions, of real interests and materials, is indirect because the crowd is never conscious of it.
quotes.name: Simone Weil

quotes.message: The imagination is never governed, it is always the ruling and divine power.
quotes.name: John Ruskin

quotes.message: A strong imagination begetteth opportunity.
quotes.name: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.message: The imagination is the secret and marrow of civilization.
quotes.name: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.message: Imagination allows you to see things in a non-traditional, non-restrictive manner. Your imagination is your picture of what tomorrow may bring.
quotes.name: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.message: Imagination is the only key to the future. Without it none exists - with it all things are possible.
quotes.name: Ida Tarbell
